Bracketeer

Bracketeer manages bracketing for martial arts tournaments. It works in unison with Overseer.

}

Bracketeer manages brackets assigned to a given mat in Overseer.

}

Multiple bracket types are supported, from 2 to 32 person brackets, for single or double elimination.

}

As each bout is completed, mat workers enter the winner. Once brackets are completed, the results are sent to Overseer.
